phys::UI::ButtonCallback

phys::UI::ButtonCallback Class Reference

This class provides customizable functionality to the button class. More...

#include <uibutton.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual void DoCallbackItems ()=0
 The function called for this callback. This will be called every time the button is checked for mouse hover.

Detailed Description

This class provides customizable functionality to the button class.

This is a pure virtual class that must be inherited from for use with specialized behaviors when working with buttons.
